snippet.title: 02 Capturing Performance - Development Diary | Senua's Saga: Hellblade II
snippet.description:
With Senua's Saga: Hellblade II we want to suspend your disbelief and immerse you in Senua's world and story. In this development diary we show you how we're working to achieve this through our use of performance capture, and take you behind the scenes of our trailer from the Xbox Games Showcase.

Follow us on social media for more open development content: 
Twitter: @NinjaTheory 
Instagram: @OfficialNinjaTheory 
TikTok: @NinjaTheoryOfficial 
Facebook: @NinjaTheory

Wish list Senua's Saga: Hellblade II

Xbox/Windows PC: https://www.xbox.com/en-gb/games/store/senuas-saga-hellblade-ii/9pmbb7nghv95 
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2461850/Senuas_Saga_Hellblade_II/
